content.content: 1. Form 1 is prescribed as the form to be used for requests under paragraph 44.1 (1) (h) of the Young Offenders Act (Canada). O. Reg. 402/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Form 1 is prescribed as the form to be used for requests under paragraph 44.1 (1) (h) of the Young Offenders Act (Canada). O. Reg. 402/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Form 2 is prescribed as the form to be used for the purpose of subsection 3 (4) of the Act. O. Reg. 402/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Form 2 is prescribed as the form to be used for the purpose of subsection 3 (4) of the Act. O. Reg. 402/00, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 402/00, s. 3. FORM 1 Parental Responsibility Act, 2000 REQUEST FOR A COPY OF   A YOUNG OFFENDERS ACT (CANADA) ORDER OF DISPOSITION  O. Reg. 402/00, Form 1. FORM 2 Parental Responsibility Act, 2000 NOTICE ABOUT EVIDENCE OBTAINED   UNDER THE YOUNG OFFENDERS ACT (CANADA)  O. Reg. 402/00, Form 2. Français
content.raw_html:
